Jokowi Ancam Gigit Para Penggigit
01 Nov 2019, 07:42 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) menegaskan tak ada ruang bagi mafia untuk membajak aparat penegak hukum. Jokowi mengancam akan 'gigit' balik para 'penggigit' program pemerintah.
Jokowi menyampaikan hal tersebut saat membuka rapat terbatas dengan jajaran Kemenko Polhukam di Istana Kepresiden, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Jakarta Pusat, Kamis (31/10/2019). Awalnya Jokowi mengingatkan kepada jajaran Menteri Kabinet Indonesia Maju untuk memberi jaminan hukum ke pelaku usaha hingga BUMN.
Sebab menurutnya, masalah investasi di RI akibat kepastian hukum yang diragukan para investor. Untuk itu, dia meminta agar aparat penegak hukum tak mencari-cari kesalahan para investor.
"Akhirnya mereka tak bisa merealisasikan investasinya. Kemudian juga para pelaku usaha dan investor dalam negeri termasuk BUMN yang banyak ketakutan dengan aparat hukum, tolong juga jangan sampai terjadi dicari-cari kesalahan, digigit-gigit, sehingga program-program yang harusnya bisa kita selesaikan berhenti di tengah jalan karena banyak orang yang enggak senang dengan pembangunan itu," kata Jokowi.
Jokowi lalu berpesan agar mengingatkan jangan sampai aparat hukum dibajak oleh mafia hingga program-program tidak berjalan. Dia siap melawan para mafia yang menggigit programnya.
"Jangan sampai para mafia yang menggigit dan menghadang program pembangunan justru terus berkeliaran. enggak. Ini harus kita balik hal ini," ucapnya.

Jokowi Threatens to Bite the Biter
Nov 01 2019, 07:42 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) stressed there was no room for the mafia to hijack law enforcement officers. Jokowi threatened to 'bite' behind the 'biter' government program.
Jokowi said that when opening a limited meeting with the ranks of the Coordinating Ministry for Politics and Security at the Presidential Palace, Jalan Medan Merdeka Utara, Central Jakarta, Thursday (10/31/2019). Initially Jokowi reminded the ranks of the Indonesian Cabinet of Ministers to give legal guarantees to business actors to BUMN.
Because according to him, the problem of investment in the Republic of Indonesia was due to legal certainty which was doubted by investors. For this reason, he requested that law enforcement officials not find fault with investors.
"Finally, they could not realize their investment. Then also domestic businesses and investors, including SOEs who were afraid of many law enforcement officials, please also don't make mistakes, be bitten, so that the programs that we should be able to finish stop in the middle of the road because many people are not happy with the construction, "said Jokowi.
Jokowi then gave a message to remind the law enforcers not to be hijacked by the mafia so that the programs did not run. He is ready to fight the mobsters who bite his program.
"Do not let the mafia who bite and block the development program actually continue to roam. Baseball. We have to reverse this," he said.
